headline.main: BRITISH WAR NEEDS PUT IN 5 CATEGORIES; Foreign Policy Association Lists Ships and Planes, Minerals, Steel, Food, Money SAYS RAIDS SLOW OUTPUT Financial Position Is Believed Not Acute Yet -- Increased Production Aid Is Urged

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 1 -- The Foreign Policy Association has drawn up a "balance sheet" of Great Britain's war needs, listing ships and airplanes, iron and steel, other minerals, food and money as essentials to the successful continuance of the war against Germany, and adding that these can be supplied only by the United States.
abstract: Foreign Policy Assn lists Brit needs; urges increased U S production and allotments
